ygData.messageBody:
>Date: Tue, 18 May 1999 18:59:02 -0400
>From: "Fondain De'Illusion" <Fondain@...>
>Subject: Lil bit from an Enchanter
>Just a lil point,
>I have watched a group of lvl 16 necros kill sand giants.... Ok, thats
fine, but here is what irks me. I realize that as an enchanter I am not
>expected to do the offense like wizards, magicians or even necros, Our
prime directive is debuffing and buffing and we get some incredible
>spells. Here are my rants.

I am a 20th level enchanter and I solo all the time, I simply use my pet
and whirl the creatures with no problem. I have been soloing since level
8th. Granted level 15th and 19th were hard with only a 12th and 16th level
pet, but I made it. I do believe that groups will appreciate you more once
you get the whirl till you hurl spell. I have people swear to me that they
would rather fight with a enchanter vs wizard anyday due to the fact that
they can whirl and have a pet.

>1. we don't get enought buff or debuff that only WE have. Why do other
classes get beserker str? Thats unbeknownst to me.

You are incorrect Ber. Str is available to enchanters as a 20th level
research spell. I confirmed this with a 30th level enchanter. (I came
across a spell list that had the spell and couldn't find it anywhere, I
then decided to ask the 30th level enchanter if they had it, they did, they
researched it).

>2. Ok, i can understand perhaps them resisting our offensive dmg spells
but how are we supposed to be a group debuffer if they resist all >our
spells? Even after using tashan or tashanii which also have a tendency to
get resisted? Kinda makes us useless in that regard eh?
>Just a few things im kinda irked about...
>
>Fondain De'Illusion, Master Enchanter of the Amber Knights, Tarew Mar

I honestly believe all mage classes have this problem of monsters resisting
spells. I was fighting a DW Croc yesterday at full health and full mana.
I almost died. I lost my pet (20th level) and had 3 resisted sanity warped
spells (92 points of damage currently) and 5 resisted whirl till you hurl.
I had to rely on a kind necro for the help to kill it in the end. BTW the
DW Croc was blue to me, I rarely ever cast a tashen spell. I find that I'm
just as sucessful with it as without it.

Do not sell yourself short. Enchanters are amoung one of the most powerful
classes out there, on the otherhand also one of the most difficult to play.

Just my 2 coppers worth for you.

To all out there, this might of been a tad bit off topic. But I did mention
the research part about bersker Str. 8)

Safe journey to all and Good Luck.

Kahlan 20th Level Enchanter (High Elf)
Master Enchanter of Clan MacLear
Xegony Server
